title: Introduction to Cryptocurrency Sentiment Analysis: Machine Learning-Based Twitter Data Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A 30-hour intensive course combining practical training with digital devices (e.g., laptops) and theoretical instruction, designed for accessibility by beginners in social sciences with a focus on hands-on learning

learning_goals: Collect 1,000+ cryptocurrency-related tweets via web scraping using RStudio.
Quantitatively assess eight basic emotions (anger, anticipation, disgust, etc.) in tweet data using machine learning-based sentiment analysis tools.
The analysis results can be visualized to explain social perception patterns toward cryptocurrency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
